scene_description_enriched: The image depicts Saint John the Baptist seated outdoors in a natural setting with trees and a body of water. He is shown with a halo, a wild beard, and curly hair, wearing a garment made of animal skin and a red cloak draped over his shoulder and lap. He holds a staff topped with a banner inscribed with "Ecce Agnus Dei" (Behold the Lamb of God). To his right, a lamb stands looking up at him, and beside the lamb is a banner with a red cross. A small bowl is placed on the ground near his feet. The scene is rendered with meticulous detail, suggesting a devotional or contemplative moment.
